cmsui.forbiddenDescription: We apologize for the inconvenience, but you don't have permissions on this resource
cmsui.loginRequired: You are trying to access a protected resource, please first
cmsui.contact: If you are certain you have the correct web address but are encountering an error, please contact the
cmsui.connectionRefusedDescription: The backend is not responding, please check if you have started Plone, check your project's configuration object apiPath (or if you are using the internal proxy, devProxyToApiPath) or the RAZZLE_API_PATH Volto's environment variable.
cmsui.connectionRefusedProduction: We apologize for the inconvenience, but the backend of the site you are accessing is not available right now. Please, try again later
cmsui.notFound: This page does not seem to existâ€¦
cmsui.notFoundDescription: We apologize for the inconvenience, but the page you are trying to access does not exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or return to the homepage.
